title: Purchasing Staff - Furniture Industry
job_description:
Handle all daily purchasing activities
Placement of orders to suppliers
Compare and evaluate offers from suppliers
Negotiate contract terms of agreement and pricing
Follow up orders and ensure timely delivery
Enter order details (e.g. vendors, quantities, prices) into internal databases
Managing supplier relations and negotiating prices and order timelines
Work with the factory to deliver on time
Maintaining the supplier database, purchase records, and related documentation
Working to improve purchasing systems and processes
Research potential suppliers
Evaluate new vendors and existing vendors' performance on regular basis.
requirements:
At least 2 years of experience in related fields, preferably in the furniture industry
Know about wood, hardware, foam, fabrics, etc..,
Experienced in both local and international purchasing
English communication
Proficient in word, excel...
Strong planning and organizational skills
Strong in time management skills
Able to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently
